Package jwrc.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
jwrc.game.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the main game component. Manages actions and records metrics of the game itself. Singleton design so as to ensure only one instance.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void endGame()
    Runs at the end of the game to show the remaining players and their respective liquidated values.

    Constructs a game instance if one not created yet, otherwise returns the active game instance
    static void kickPlayerFromGame​(Player player)
    Used to remove a player from the game if they go Bankrupt.

    sets up the game by asking for user input for number of players, names, colours etc.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Game getInstance()
      Constructs a game instance if one not created yet, otherwise returns the active game instance
      Returns:
      Game instance

    • preGame

      public void preGame()
      sets up the game by asking for user input for number of players, names, colours etc.

    • start

      public void start()
      implements the main game loop - checks when end-game conditions have been met

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Runs at the end of the game to show the remaining players and their respective liquidated values. Player with the highest value after liquidation wins.

    • kickPlayerFromGame

      public static void kickPlayerFromGame​(Player player)
      Used to remove a player from the game if they go Bankrupt.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who is to be kicked from the game
